description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Outnumbered, but not outgunned!  Destroy the relentless waves of enemy MiG-15 jet aircraft, and be the Top Gun.    Your weapon is the legendary North American F-86 Sabre jet. Play solo or with 1-4 player coop in this fast paced, Korean war era shooter.   Mere survival is not enough - you'll need a severe case of "MiG Madness", and hunger for crazy Power-ups to truly be the best!
